description: Police said a 19-year-old man has been arrested and their inquiries are continuing.
title: Man arrested after emails sent to Highland and Moray schools
title_page: Man arrested after emails sent to Highland and Moray schools - BBC News
maintext:
A teenager has been arrested after malicious emails were sent to a number of schools in north and north-east Scotland.
Police said they were made aware on Friday morning that emails had been sent to schools in the Nairn, Auldearn and Inverness areas in the Highlands and Forres area in Moray.
A spokesperson said a 19-year-old man had been arrested.
Police Scotland said inquiries were ongoing.
